name: Edges - Save The Ball
description:
***** The Best addictive Game ever - EDGES *****

Tap to Play. Avoid hitting the line!
How long can you stay without hitting the LINES?
This is a simple game, with one simple rule - Don't touch the EDGES. Improve your high score in endless/Normal mode and see where you stand in Game Centre.

The rule is simple - Don't let the balls hit the lines.

Key Features
************************************
◉ Fast & exciting game play.
◉ Vivid, modern & incredible graphics.
◉ Share, compete, challenge score with friends and family with the new multiplayer mode.
◉ Highly addictive and Free to play.
◉ Download the Trivia game for free and Play, Challenge LIVE with friends and family.
◉ Unlock different objects and keep playing.
***********************************

How far can you make it? Start playing this seamless journey now for free and compete with friends & family.
